name: La Cepada Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In a trip around Northern Spain, staying at five 4 star hotels this was the only one that failed to meet expectations.
reviews.title: FAWLTY TOWERS, PART 2 - MANUEL'S REVENGE

reviews.text: First the positives - the size of the rooms and the view.
reviews.title: Unforgettable stay

reviews.text: Unfortunately the rest is all negative – there is no way of understanding how this is classified as a four star hotel.
reviews.title: Mostly Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Customer service is zero in all areas
reviews.title: good personal attention

description: Enjoy some delightful days in the heart of the Principality of Asturias. The hotel, which was built in 2001, has four floors and a total of twenty rooms, two of which are suites and eighteen double rooms. It has a foyer with lifts and a reception area that is open 24 hours a day. We also have the renowned restaurant, El Cenador de los Canonigos, where you will find a creative cuisine based on products from Asturias. The food will delight you and the surroundings and the quality of the service will invite you to sit back, relax and enjoy some exquisite dishes.
